title: Global NAND memory bit market share 2020 , by application
summary: This grouped bar chart shows Memory Demand Share on the Y-axis for 6 different Races for 2 groups 2019, and 2020 that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Smartphone had the maximum Memory Demand Share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2020. The minimum Memory Demand Share was observed in Race Other for 2019.
In Race Smartphone, 2019 had the maximum Memory Demand Share and it saw the lowest in Race Other out of all 6 Races.
Race Smartphone and Other had the biggest gap of 32.0 between the highest and lowest Memory Demand Share found for 2019.
min_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Memory Demand Share on the Y-axis for 6 different Races for 2 groups 2019, and 2020 that are presented on the X-axis.
Out of all 2 groups, 2020 had the highest Memory Demand Share in Race Smartphone and 2019 had the lowest Memory Demand Share in Race Other.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Memory Demand Share on the Y-axis for 6 different Races for 2 groups 2019, and 2020 that are presented on the X-axis.
Race Smartphone had the maximum Memory Demand Share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2020. The minimum Memory Demand Share was observed in Race Other for 2019.
In Race Smartphone, 2019 had the maximum Memory Demand Share and it saw the lowest in Race Other out of all 6 Races.
Race Smartphone and Other had the biggest gap of 32.0 between the highest and lowest Memory Demand Share found for 2019.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different Races on X-axis for 2 groups 2019, and 2020. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Memory Demand Share.
Race Smartphone had the maximum Memory Demand Share among all 2 groups, and it was for 2020. The minimum Memory Demand Share was observed in Race Other for 2019.
In Race Smartphone, 2019 had the maximum Memory Demand Share and it saw the lowest in Race Other out of all 6 Races.
The maximum Memory Demand Share for 2019 that was found in Race Smartphone was 11.67 times larger than the minimum Memory Demand Share observed in Race Other.
Out of all 2 groups, the highest gap between the maximum and minimum Memory Demand Share was found in case of 2019.
On average, the Race Smartphone had the highest Memory Demand Share for all 2 groups 2019, and 2020. Whereas Other had the lowest average Memory Demand Share.
